title: Remove the cast time on Galio Tornado
body:
It doesnt make much sense that an ability that speeds him up also slows him down. Make it like Kat w or zed e where you cast it and he doesnt need to stand still and cast it for a split second.

I think it would be a decent buff for the time being.

But i also don't want to see his kit change too much cause i really love the feel of it. It has a original feel and having two ranged skills is really nice in lane. 

Though, putting it into perspective, Having a dash means having less ranged skills, meaning high risk/high reward is brought to the table. it sort of balances itself out in the end.

On a side note, a semi-useful galio tip is that you can use E-Flash to cancel the cast time if you like. Can be helpful when chasing (although using flash without your ult kinda sucks).

- In response to making it a dash with the wind tunnel appearing behind him, this would hurt his lane phase a lot since he couldn't last hit/poke with his E
- Another idea is to make it have no cast time, but applies a buff where he leaves the trail/wind tunnel behind him, sort of like Nocturne's Q.  This would help him utilize it for escaping/chasing a bit better (on top of having no cast time).  However this still hurts his lane phase for the same reason as the first.

Removing the cast time on the move but leaving it as is otherwise seems best.
